defaultMessage: Some thoughts about programming, tooling, and walk-through articles about programming ideas I wish I knew earlier.

This series of articles will teach you how to setup your own React component library using Storybook, how to export and import them in a React application using Tree Shaking, and how to streamline the component design while improving your quality pipeline.
